# üç≥ Recipes for [Velocity](https://github.com/khulnasoft/velocity)

**Welcome to the official Velocity cookbook**!

Here you can find the most **delicious** recipes to cook delicious meals using our web framework.

## üë©‚Äçüç≥ Have a delicious recipe?

If you have found an amazing recipe for **Velocity** ‚Äî share it with others!
We are ready to accept your [PR](https://go.khulnasoft.com/velocity/recipes/pulls) and add your recipe to the cookbook (both on [website](https://docs.khulnasoft.io) and this repository).
